title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bag 3X GTA$ and RP on Drift and Drag Races
content:
Twist, turn, and accelerate strategically to rule the road in Drift and Drag Races while earning 3X GTA$ and RP. In addition to street cred and bragging rights, winning two Drift or Drag Races before June 24 will net you a bonus of GTA$100,000.

Drift and Drag Races are accessible by talking to the Race Organizer inside the LS Car Meet or through your iFruit with an LS Car Meet Membership.
